TopicTitle: Activate Action Group on specific stages?

Articles.Content: I was thinkering around the action group area and I was wondering if you could create "custom" stages based on part actions, like deploy solar panel on stage 3, or decouple node at stage 1, There is a "stage" on action groups but all it does is activate in the very first stage

Take a look at this mod:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64227-0-23-22-Jan-Smart-Parts-V0-3-NEW-Fuel-Valve-and-Detail-Improvements

judging by your response I guess It isn't doable in the stock game, (making specific actions stage-able)

I'll look into that mod you said. thanks

You can assign, lets say, Decouple so-and-so, activate so-and-so engine, and deploy pannel in the same action group, 1-0. You just have to put your one non-stage action in the action group with the staging you wanted to go with it.

I have tried and failed to find this in stock. I don't think it's implemented yet, but I would like either:

- What you suggest, tying actions to stages so I can manipulate during flight.

or

- Be able to adjust action groups in flight.

I think there are mods for both of these, but stock doesn't seem to do it.
I would love to be able to change action groups in flight!!

ah ha! Cool! except that one is broken now?? i found another one called Action Group Manager.

THANKS!!!
